abstract: A new study from Forrester Research says that older Americans are readily adopting technologies like social networking, blogs and online video.
snippet: A new study from Forrester Research says that older Americans are readily adopting technologies like social networking, blogs and online video.
lead_paragraph: It’s probably safe to say that Whopper Sacrifice, Burger King’s impish Facebook campaign that offered users free burgers in exchange for dropping 10 friends, wasn’t aimed at retirees. But maybe it should have been.

headline.main: Baby Boomers, Luddites? Not So Fast
